body.name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Burgundy Fabric Multifunction Swivel Ergonomic Task Office Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 2 hrs 42 mins
features: Note : To ensure proper assembly, please follow all steps provided in the User manual (provided in pdf below)
Back Height Adjustment Knob positions the lumbar support to reduce back pain
body.description: Articulating the sophistication of European styling, along with the functionality of a multi-positional chair, this chair is sure to please. Mid-back office chairs are the logical choice for performing an array of tasks, offering support to the mid-to-upper back region. This chair is ideal for anyone who does a great deal of typing throughout the day and needs good back support. The locking back angle adjustment lever changes the angle of your torso to reduce disc pressure. The contoured seat dissipates pressure points for greater comfort. The waterfall front seat edge removes pressure from the lower legs and improves circulation. Chair easily swivels 360 degrees to get the maximum use of your workspace without strain. The pneumatic adjustment lever will allow you to easily adjust the seat to your desired height.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lumbar Support This chair features adjustable lumbar support conveniently located and facilitated by a knob to the right of the seat. Lumbar support will contour to the user's back and reinforce healthy posture, while also reducing back strain and muscle fatigue.

Seat Adjustments The pneumatic adjustment lever will allow you to easily adjust the seat to your desired height. Tilt lock mechanism rocks/tilts the chair and locks in an upright position. Tilt tension adjustment knob adjusts the chair's backward tilt resistance.
Base and Wheels Our heavy-duty 5-star base features dual caster wheels, which are designed to increase stability and ease of movement around the office area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Seat is comfortable, back won't keep its adjustment
reviews.reviewText: Overall the seat is comfortable when adjusted. The big problem is that the back rest keeps sliding down no matter how much I tighten the knob. When the backrest sinks to its lowest position it pushes me too far forwards on the seat so I have to adjust the backrest up again. If I had known the back rest wouldn't keep its adjustment I probably wouldn't have purchased this chair.The overall height adjustments of the seat are fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2011
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice chair. The lumbar support and back height adjustment is a real plus. It is very well made and sturdy. I put it together in about 20 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice look. Fragile parts.
reviews.reviewText: I ended up returning this one because, once assembled, part of the back support snapped and made the chair unusable. It was comfortable for the few moments it was in one piece. It was easy to assemble and had a look that fit well into the area I work in. Opted for a local purchase rather than deal with the potential of having to return the item if there was a problem with a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars MISREPRESENTED! Pictures NOT what you will receive! BUYER BEWARE!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this chair realizing the picture was a black chair but the description stated it was Burgundy. I figured like most things this model was available in different colors so I looked through all the pictures. Several showcase this with and without armrests. Knowing some chairs you have the option of installing the arms or not, this was a HUGE selling point for me as I wanted 2 identical chairs, yet I didnt want arms and my husband did. Now after its been processed I get an email saything these chairs are ARMLESS! Now minutes after I get notice that this has been processed the company says I will have to pay for shipping and handling for these to go back to them once it arrives here!!! The company said the arm rests are sold seperately, I asked how much that would be and have not received any more replies from them. In all my years of buying through Amazon I have never had anything like this happen. Very unhappy. =(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to be a decent chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: My new chair arrived last night, so it's only got about 10 minutes of sit time, but those 10 minutes are a huge upgrade from time spent in my previous chair. There was a small snag in the fabric in the front, but a quick snip with some scissors and you can't tell. Also, the back support is covered in a rubber piece which was pushed in in several places, but that's merely an aesthetic issue. The seat is quite firm and feels like it should hold up well. Set up was quick and easy. though the directions consisted of a picture-their version didn't have arms, so the bolts provided didn't match the photo, a little confusing if you're the type to do a quick inventory of parts before starting, but it didn't effect construction after that. Has an easy movement for up/down and tilt to the seat back, the arm settings are more fixed. There is also a knob on the side for lumbar support. All in all I feel it was a great purchase for the $90 that Amazon was asking at my time of purchase, however if I wouldn't have saved the $200 like they claimed I might have been a little put off by the snag and back support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flash Furniture WL-A654MG-BK-GG Mid-Back Black Fabric Multi-Functional Task
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this item because of the good price and reviews I had read. Since i plan to use it for quilting and sewing I didn't need arms. Once I sat on it I knew it was the perfect choice. There seems to be good support for my back and sitting for short periods. It was easy to put together which was a surprise. I am not an engineer so did what I could then hubby helped with the rest.When it arrived one side of the box was ripped and you could see what was inside. I ordered this used and guess that means that the warehouse was instructed not to tape the box together where it was torn. Other side was perfect howver top was crushed. It was so bad the delivery person made a not and I took pictures of the mess. As it turned out everything was intact and that was a surprise. Everything turned out fine but it was a scary delivery. One more thing instructions are in picture form rather than written for anyone that might find that info helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I'm a secretary who sits all day. I all about the ergonomic at my desk. This chair is great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This chair was very easy to assemble and is very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This chair was very easy to assemble and is very comfortable. I do a lot of sitting and have a bad back - the lumbar support can be adjusted to individual need which was very important to me, as can height of seat, etc. I would definitely recommend this chair and feel it's a good value for the price.
